Class Explosion

java.lang.Object
  Explosion
Direct Known Subclasses:
DefenderExplosion, MissileExplosion
public abstract class Explosion
extends Object

This class represents a simple two-dimensional explosion in the Missile Command game world.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Tobias Salem, alias Vassago

Field Summary
protected  int currentRadius
          The radius of the explosion measured in pixels.
protected  float damage
          The damage of the explosion, floating point value between 0 and 1
protected  int growthSpeed
          The growth speed measured in radius pixels per time step.
protected  Vector2D location
          The location of the center of the explosion.
protected  int maxRadius
          The maximum radius of the explosion measured in pixels.
 
Constructor Summary
Explosion()
          Creates a new instance of Explosion, with everything set to its default value.
Explosion(Vector2D location, int maxRadius, int growthSpeed)
          Constructs an Explosion with a current radius of 0 centered at the Vector2D location, with the specified maximum radius (in pixels) and rate of growth (in pixels per time step).

          Increase the explosion radius by the rate of growth for one time step.

Field Detail

location

protected Vector2D location
The location of the center of the explosion.

currentRadius

protected int currentRadius
The radius of the explosion measured in pixels. Defaults to 0.

maxRadius

protected int maxRadius
The maximum radius of the explosion measured in pixels. The default value is 40 pixels.

growthSpeed

protected int growthSpeed
The growth speed measured in radius pixels per time step. The default value is 5 radius pixels per time step.

damage

protected float damage
The damage of the explosion, floating point value between 0 and 1

Constructor Detail

Explosion

public Explosion()
Creates a new instance of Explosion, with everything set to its default value.

Explosion

public Explosion(Vector2D location,
                 int maxRadius,
                 int growthSpeed)
Constructs an Explosion with a current radius of 0 centered at the Vector2D location, with the specified maximum radius (in pixels) and rate of growth (in pixels per time step).

Parameters:
location - the location of the explosion
maxRadius - the maximum radius of the explosion
growthSpeed - the growth speed of the explosion

Returns the location of the center of the explosion

vector representing the center of the explosion

location - vector representing the center of the explosion

Sets the maximum radius of the explosion

getGrowthSpeed

public int getGrowthSpeed()
Returns the rate of growth (in pixels per time step) of the explosion

Returns:
the growth speed of the explosion

setGrowthSpeed

public void setGrowthSpeed(int growthSpeed)
Sets how many pixels the radius of the explosion will grow every time step.

Parameters:
growthSpeed - the growth speed of the explosion

getCurrentRadius

public int getCurrentRadius()
Returns the current radius of the explosion.

Returns:
the current radius of the explosion

setCurrentRadius

public void setCurrentRadius(int currentRadius)
Set the current radius of the explosion. If this is greater than the maximum radius then the maximum radius is used.

Parameters:
currentRadius - the radius to be set for the exploion

getDamage

public float getDamage()
Returns the damage of this explosion

Returns:
damage of this explosion

setDamage

public void setDamage(float dmg)
Sets the damage of this explosion

Parameters:
dmg - the damage value of this explosion

explode

public boolean explode()
Increase the explosion radius by the rate of growth for one time step. This method is synchronized to protect the progression of the explosion.

Returns:
true if the explosion has reached its maximum radius, false otherwise

intersects

public boolean intersects(Missile missile)
Checks if this explosion intersects the given missile

Parameters:
missile - which to chek for intersection
Returns:
true if the missile intersects this explosion, false otherwise

intersects

public boolean intersects(Building building)
Checks if this explosion interescts the given building

Parameters:
building - which to check for intersection
Returns:
true if the building intersects this explosion, false otherwise
